dooyit.ui

Class UIDayBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.ui.UIDayBox

  • public class UIDayBox
extends java.lang.Object
    The UIDayBox class contains all the UITaskBox objects whose Task belongs to a single day or Task type.
    Since:
    2016-04-10
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Wu Wenqi

        This method is used to initialize UIDayBox. It is used by the constructor.

        This method is used to initialize the title of the view box. It is used by the initDayTitle method.

      • isEmptyAndNotToday

        private boolean isEmptyAndNotToday()
        This method is used to check if the TaskGroup is not today's and is empty. It is used by the initDayTitle method.
        Returns:
        True if the TaskGroup is not today's and is empty, False otherwise.

      • isTodayTaskGroup

        private boolean isTodayTaskGroup()
        This method is used to check that the TaskGroup is today's. It is used by the isEmptyAndNotToday method.
        Returns:
        True if the TaskGroup is today's.

      • initAllTasks

        private void initAllTasks()
        This method is used to initialize all Task objects in the TaskGroup. It is used by the initialize method.

      • addAllTasks

        private void addAllTasks()
        This method is used to add all Task objects from the TaskGroup. It is used by the initAllTasks method.

      • displayNoTasks

        private void displayNoTasks()
        This method is used to display in the view box a message which says that the user does not have any tasks for today. It is used by the initAllTasks method.

      • addTask

        private void addTask(Task task)
        This method is used to create a UITaskBox for a Task and add its view to the view box.
        Parameters:
        task - The Task to create a UITaskBox for.

      • setNoTaskMessage

        private void setNoTaskMessage()
        This method is used to create a label informing the user that he has not tasks for today, and add it to the view box. It is used by the initAllTasks method.

        protected UIMainViewType getActiveMainView()
        This method is used to get the currently active UIMainViewType of the UI.

        This method is used to get the stage width of the application scene.
        Returns:
        The stage width of the application scene.

      • markTask

        protected void markTask(int taskId)
        This method is used to mark a Task as completed.
        Parameters:
        taskId - The displayed id of the Task to be marked as completed.

      • unmarkTask

        protected void unmarkTask(int taskId)
        This method is used to unmark a previously marked Task.
        Parameters:
        taskId - The displayed id of the Task to be unmarked.
